full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA BRGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS BYUNG BA LA LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CUNG ZAD RGYAS NAS BGYIS PA ZHES AER TE NI CIS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR MA CHOG PAR SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE SLONG RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, ,BYANG BYUNG RGYAL PO SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD LOG PA'I KYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRZE BAS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU LAS BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
